Topic.Title: Adding conversation topics on the web editor?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi, I'm running the web editor because I'm in linux (There's some odd error in wine where the exe never finds mscoree.dll no mater what)  and can't find any information on how to add conversation topics on it.
Is it possible at all?
